name: Black Right Hand Archery Glove
description: Our archery gloves protect the fingers and hand when firing arrows reducing the friction against the arrow shaft and feathers.  Placed in the finger and thumb this glove goes in the hand that you hold the bow with and is made with quality thin stitched leather.
